name: Darkipt bomb
description:
Neil mass-produced, sold off, and earned a living from horrific bombs.
What would happen to everyone in the city if the bomb exploded alone?

◆ About this game

・ It is saved for each chapter and can be restarted from BOOK.
・ Serious from beginning to end, including grotesque and scaring expressions. Please be careful if you are not good at it

◆ About the world view

This work has a connection with another work, "A story that grabs the clouds." I don't think you have to play either one first because the times are different and this is completed as one work here.
